inn1.comm: starts off with a gentle delivery on the middle and off stump line, Smith gets well forward and taps it away towards midwicket

second ball of the day and Smith is history! good length delivery, pitched in-line with the leg stump and shaping across, Smith goes back to defend but is beaten all ends up and the ball hits the pad right in front of the stumps - what a start.
way outside the off stump and shaping away, rightly called a wide

Third ball of the day and Gibbs is history! South Africa in all sorts of trouble here - another line and length delivery, this one shaped away late and Gibbs was sucked forward into the defensive shot, Malik at first slip took it low towards his right, Gibbs' problems with the bat continue...
defended on the back-foot
left alone outside the off stump
another loud appeal for caught behind, looked like the ball clipped the thigh pad - appeal turned down, end of a fantastic first over
starts off with a ripper, on the off stump line and moving away - Dippenaar was clueless
off the pads to short fine leg, easy single
this one nipped back in and Kallis gets hit on the thigh
another line and length delivery, defended on the back-foot
on the middle and leg stump line, again shaping back into the right-hander, Kallis is once again beaten and the ball rolls away off the pad
bit of width and shaping away, Dippenaar goes for the cuts and is beaten by a long way
off-cutter, hit on the pad
beaten outside the off stump, done in by the swing

streaky! short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Dippennar is made to play at it and the ball flies off the outside edge, lucky for him the ball went well over the fielder at second slip
inside edge and the ball crashes into the pad
half-volley outside the off stump and Dippenaar drills it through the gap between the cover fielder, solid shot
short of a length outside off stump, played with an open face to point
fullish length and that nips back into the right hander, the batsman gets a half stride forward and defends to the off side
pitches wide outside off stump and moves away of the pitch, Rao completes a maiden over
pitches short of a length on off stump, Kallis drops it with soft hands short of cover and sets off for a quick single
whoops, that pitched on a good length and rose viciously into Dippenaar's ribs, he takes one for the team on the body
pushed to cover on the front foot for another single
that rises steeply again from a good length outside off stump, Kallis drops his arms and lets it go
beauty! pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away late, Dippennar had no option but to play at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
on the middle and off stump line, defended on the back-foot

short of a good length delivery, Dippenaar stands tall on the back-foot and defends it into the track and then for some reason takes off for a nonexistent single, Rao follows it up nicely and flicks the ball onto the stumps. Dippenaar is saved by the dive - third umpire confirms
defended watchfully
short of a length and this one jagged back in, Dippennar had to hurry there, ends up with an inside edge onto the pads
thrid maiden in a row, wicket to wicket delivery and dippenaar watchfully defends it away off the back-foot
glided down to third man for an easy single
short rising delivery, Dippenaar stands tall on the back-foot and defends it with a straight bat
again short and coming in with the angle, defended watchfully
good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing and Dippenaar leaves it through to the keeper
defended on the back-foot
worked away off the back-foot to the midwicket region, easy single
fuller in length, pitched wide outside the off stump and shaping away further, Dippenaar shoulders arms
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended awkwardly
good length delivery, probably the scrambled seam as this one went straight on after hitting the deck, Dippenaar watches it all the way into the keeper's gloves
again left alone outside the off stump

and the jaffer, previous two deliveries went straight on and this one jagged back into the right hander, Dippenaar fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad, bit too high to be given out and the appeal is promptly turned down Billy
forced away on the off side
bit of width offered outside the off stump, Kallis nicely gets on top of the bounce and drives it through cover point for a brace
ordinary delivery outside the off stump, Kallis leaves it through to the stumper
good length delivery, close to the off stump line with a bit of swing at the tail end, Kallis stays back and glides it down to third man for an easy single
Dippenaar too gets one down to third man, they are doing it the hard way
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Kallis waits for the ball and with a flick of the wrists works it into the gap between gully and third slip

short and wide outside the off stump, first loose delivery of the day - Kallis waited for it and at the last moment hammered it through cover point for the third boundary of the day. Stood tall, got right on top of the bounce and placed it to perfection - classy shot
pushed away on the leg side for a quick single

three down! short rising delivery, this one was pitched close to the off stump line, Dippenaar was beaten by the late away movement and the edge is produced. Akmal dived full stretch to his right and took it from right in front of the first slip, brilliant take.
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery, de Villiers taps it away on the off side
inside edge onto the pad and another successful over comes to an end
short and wide outside the off stump, begging to be hit and Kallis murdered it through cover point
defended watchfully
worked away off the pads to the square leg region
left alone outside the off stump
short and wide outside the off stump and de Villiers cuts it past the fielder at backward point - good positive shot
good length delivery, this one nipped back in off the seam and Kallis gets hit on the box, that hurts
good length delivery, this one shaped away from the right-hander, no shot offered

edged and gone! this is brilliant stuff from Rao - he hit the perfect line and length and the pitch did the rest, late away swing draws Kallis forward into the drive and the edge goes straight to Akmal behind the stumps. South Africa four down and looking straight down the barrel here
good length delivery outside the off stump, bit too wide to interest the batsman
testing delivery outside the off stump, Boucher watchfully leaves it through to the keeper
another fine over comes to an end with a short of a good length delivery outside the off stump
worked away well in front of square leg
has a slash at one outside the off stump, ball clips the outer half of the bat and flies over the slip cordon
left alone outside the off stump
off-cutter, de Villiers gets hit on the pad

and the party continues! good length delivery, bowled from wide of the crease, came in with the angle and shaped away after hitting the deck, another thick edge produced on the froward prod and Akmal makes no mistake.
defended to point
driven straight to the fielder at extra cover
good length delivery, once again Boucher finds a fielder on the off-side
wayward delivery down the leg side
short ball outside the off stump, Boucher rocks back and thuds it past the fielder at point, clean hit
good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
Rao strays onto the pads, Boucher gets well inside the line and clips it down to fine leg for a single - was looking for the second but the fielder in the deep was alert
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards midwicket
short of a good length delivery, this one came in with the angle - Boucher stands tall on the back-foot and taps it away well wide of the fielder at mid-off, Early call and Kemp responded well
defended on the back-foot
50 comes up - short and wide outside the off stump, with Kemp at the other end, better forget it - flamboyant cut shot and the ball thuds into the point boundary in no time
more runs, worked away off the pads to deep midwicket
turned away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
width offered and Boucher cuts well, timed it to perfection but the placement was poor - straight to the point fielder she went
played away wathfully
on the middle and off stump line, forced away towards cover
another good length delivery, this one nipped back in a touch, Kemp on the back-foot defending
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Kemp uses the depth of the crease and drives it through the gap between mid-off and cover
defended on the back-foot
fraction short around the off stump, nipping in a bit, Boucher adjusts and defends it down
short ball on the off stump and moving away, opens up Boucher and ball hits him on the thigh
short ball outside off stump, Boucher picks up the length quickly and tries to pull but gets the bottom edge, ball rolls away to gully region
nipping into the pads, Boucher fails to put it away, gets on the pads&
Beauty! good length ball outside off stump, swinging in, Boucher moves forward and tries to drive but gets completely beaten
short of length ball on the stumps, Boucher moves back and defends it away behind square, easy single taken
full length ball on the off stump, mistimed drive to mid-off
defended on the back-foot to mid-on
good length ball on the off stump, nipping in, Boucher defends it away on the front-foot
short ball on the off stump and nipping in, Boucher pulls it away to fine leg
one more good length ball on the off stump, solidly defended away on the front-foot to cover
short of length ball around the off stump, Kemp defends it away to short covers
Gul comes up with a bouncer off the first ball, Boucher not interested and ducks underneath
follows up with a good length ball on the off stump, Boucher drives on the up but straight to mid-off fielder
short ball just outside off stump, ball keeps a bit low, Boucher edges it but one bounce to Younis at wide 2nd slip
defended away to mid-on the back-foot
short of length ball on the leg stump, turned away behind square for an easy single
short ball on the off stump and moving away, Kemp covers and defends it away to point
short ball from Razzaq on the off stump, not much of pace either, Boucher picks the length quickly, rocks back and pulls it away to mid-wicket fence
pitched up outside off stump, Boucher stretches forward and drives through covers for a couple of runs
half-volley on the stumps, driven back hard but Razzaq gets his foot on the way and stops a certain boundary
defended on the back-foot to cover
short ball on the off stump, driven on the back-foot straight to mid-on fielder
good length ball on the off stump, pushed away to the point fielder
defended on the back-foot
short ball just outside off stump, spinning in, punched away to cover
defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
good length ball on the off stump, defended away to point
Hafeez pushes this one, Kemp just taps it away to mid-wicket
defended on the front-foot, Hafeez starts with a maiden over
short ball on the off stump, Boucher pulls it away nicely to mid-wicket fence
short ball again from Yasir, this time Boucher mistimes his cut shot, ball rolls away to offside and they take an easy single
turned away on the back-foot to legside
short ball outside off stump, punched away hard to the sweeper cover
mistimed cut again but anyway they take a single on the offside, good over for Proteas!
on the pads, batsman misses and ball takes off the pads to short fine leg
full length ball outside off stump, swinging away, batsman drives and gets the outside edge to thirdman
short ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to mid-on
fraction short on the stumps, Boucher comes inside the line and turns it away through mid-wicket
Run out missed! defended away to point, Boucher calls for a single but sent back by Kemp, Farhat picks up and throws wide of the stumps
fraction short around the off stump, punched on the back-foot to mid-off fielder
short ball outside off stump, Boucher cuts it away to sweeper cover
on the pads, Kemp flicks but ball clips the pads and runs away fine to the fence
good length ball on the middle stump, driven to mid-on
good length ball outside off stump, Kemp lets it go
short ball down the legside, this is poor bowling from Yasir
short of length ball outside off stump, swinging away a bit, no shot offered
short ball on the off stump, Boucher moves back and punches down the ground straight to mid-on fielder
defended on the back-foot to offside
on the middle and leg stump, turned away wide of the mid-on fielder and take a quick single
driven on the front--foot to mid-off
turned away on the front-foot to legside
driven on the front-foot to long-off
cut away straight to the point fielder
good length ball on the off stump, defended
turned away on the front-foot to legside and an easy single taken
short of length ball on the leg stump, nipping in, batsman tries to glance but gets on the pads, runs away to square leg
good length ball outside off stump, not much of swing this time, Kemp plays for the inswing and gets beaten
length ball around the off stump, ball keeps a bit low, Kemp adjusts well and comes down in time and negotiates it
good length ball outside off stump, batsman lets it go
short of length ball on the leg stump, nipping in, Kemp pushes it away to mid-on and takes a quick single
good length ball around the off stump, bat-pad defends to cover
flighted leg-break this time from Afridi, defended
short ball on the off stump, Kemp forces it on the back-foot but straight to the cover fielder
defended on the front-foot, bowled a bit slow this time by Afridi
down the legside, Kemp fails to put it away for runs
Afridi pushes this one through, Kemp defends it away to short mid-wicket
short of length ball on the off stump, turning away nicely, pushed away to covers
fraction short on the off stump, nipping in, Boucher tries to turn it away onside but the extra bounce beats him and hits on the thigh
short ball on the off stump, punched away on the back-foot but Boucher doesnt pick the gap this time
short of length ball on the off stump, defended away to covers
short ball outside off stump, Boucher goes for the cut but misses it
flighted leg-break on the off stump, Boucher picks the length and sweeps nicely in front of square, excellent placement and brings Proteas 100
faster one outside off stump, Boucher gets on the pads, appeal but stuck outside off stump
turned away on the front-foot to mid-wicket
on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg
leg-break on the off stump, Boucher sweeps and gets it right again, superbly timed and ball races away to the square leg fence
pitched up outside off stump, Kemp moves forward and drives superbly through covers
pushed through extra-cover and this is sensible batting from Kemp
on the pads, glanced away to fine leg, 6 runs already in this over
good length ball around the off stump, defended on the front-foot
slower one on the stumps, Kemp picks it up from his hand and defends it away to short covers
length ball outside off stump, Kemp smashes on the front-foot to sweeper cover
off the pads to square leg and they take a single
short ball, Boucher pulls it away to deep mid-wicket but not from the middle of the bat
short ball outside off stump, cut away to sweeper cover, fielder doesnt pick it up cleanly but they settle with a single
defended on the front-foot to offside
flighted ball on the middle stump, Boucher tries to work it away onside but gets the edge
short ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to offside
good length ball on the stumps, Kemp gets his bat down in time and defends it down the wicket
fraction short on the off stump, Kemp defends it down solidly into cover point and picks a single
short of length ball on the off stump, nipping away a bit, Boucher tries to defend onside and gets the leading edge to silly point region, quick single taken
defended on the back-foot to short extra-cover, Rao bowling a very good line and length
good length ball on the off stump, Kemp defends it away with soft hands to mid-off and scampers through a single
fraction short around the off sutmp, glided away wide of the short thirdman fielder
short ball just outside off stump, cut away to point fielder
on the pads, worked away nicely to deep square leg
good length ball just outside off stump, coming in off the wicket, batsman tries to defend but gets on the pads
worked away off the pads to short fine leg
short of length ball outside off stump, punched away on the back-foot to sweeper cover
short of length ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot down the wicket
straying on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg
again on the pads, Kemp comes inside the line and flicks it away to square leg
short ball on the off stump, Boucher pulls it away hard in front of the square, no chance for the deep square leg fielder to cut it off
short of length ball, defended on the back-foot to offside
on the middle and leg stump, turned away wide of the mid-on fielder
short ball just outside off stump, mistimed cut to the point fielder
on the middle and leg stump, turned away to square leg and completes two runs, brings up his fifty and a very valuable one
short ball outside off stump, cut away to the sweeper cover
short ball again from Afridi, Kemp cuts it hard and wide of the sweeper cover fielder, ball races away to the fence
turned away with the spin to the midwicket region
bit quicker on this occasion, worked away straight to the fielder at mid-on
driven down to long-on for an easy single
tossed up, Kemp comes forward and taps it back to the bowler
turning into middle and leg, Kemp waits on the back-foot and turns it away with the spin to the square leg region, no room for a single there
punched back, diving stop by Hafeez saves runs - another harmless over comes to an end
worked away with the spin to the fine leg region
drifting down the leg side
drifting onto middle and leg, turned away behind square for an easy single and that brings up the 100 runs partnership, way to go boys
forced away to deep midwicket for a single
slightly short, Kemp goes on the back-foot and cuts it away through cover point
tossed up on the middle and leg stump line, Boucher goes for the sweep and manages to beat the fielder at short fine leg - four more valuable runs added to the total
rolls away off the pad to the short midwicket region
on the stumps, Kemp shuffles across and taps it away towards square leg, fielder moves across quickly and negates the chance of a single
defended towards cover
worked away on the leg side for an easy single
driven straight back down the track to long-on
turned away on the leg side
there is the slog sweep but this time the man at midwicket makes a half stop, they scramble through for a single
defended on the front-foot, ball rolls away towards point
premeditated sweep but Kemp fails to make contact
bit of a skidder, pushed back to the bowler
forced away through cover point, again just the single
quicker delivery, on the middle and leg stump line, turned away towards midwicket
tossed up and turning in, Kemp comes down the track but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
quicker and fuller, forced away on the leg side
driven away towards midwicket, Younis Khan gets a touch on it but fails to prevent the single
swept down to fine leg, easy single
flatter trajectory, Kemp comes down to the pitch of the delivery and drives it down to long-on
Boucher too comes down the track, was looking for the big one but he fails to make proper contact
turned away nicely
lofted over the man at wide long-on, just about managed to clear the fielder in the deep
turned away to deep square leg
defended on the front-foot
nicely swept away to fine leg for a brace
worked away off the back-foot to the midwicket region
fuller and quicker - driven straight back to the bowler
drifting down the leg side, Boucher had a go at it but luckily for Hafeez he failed to make contact
straight to the fielder at midwicket
low fulltoss and Boucher is beaten playing across the line, loud appeal for lbw turned down - looked close
gets inside the line and drives against the spin, easy single down to long-off
driven back to the bowler, was there to be hit and Kemp is livid with himself
on the middle and leg stump line, driven down to long-on for a single
off-cutter, Kemp pushes forward and drives it down to long-on
slower delivery, Boucher picked it up late but he quickly changed his shot and punched it down to long-on for a single - well played in the end
tad quicker and on the stumps, Kemp ends up with an inside edge onto his pad, no room for a single there
driven down to, you guessed it right, long-on for yet another easy single

finally the breakthrough - slightly short and on the stumps, Boucher steps forward and swings hard, ball clips the edge and balloons up towards point, Hafeez calls for it and nicely settles under it, took a long time for the ball to come down but he took it as clean as a whistle  - end of an amazing partnership
defended on the front-foot
down the leg side
turned away to midwicket
driven down to long-on
off the pads to third man, appeal turned down
defended down on the off side
pitched up outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
strays down the leg side, ball clips the pad and rolls down to short fine leg
worked away off the pads for an easy single
driven away just wide of the fielder at mid-off, Kemp takes off for a single but Pollock was not interested - in the end the throw misses the target and Kemp makes it back safely
worked away behind square on the leg side
this one kept low and was drifting down the leg side, ball clips the pad and rolls down to short fine leg
defended outside the off stump

Pollock too perishes trying to up the tempo - comes down the track and swings hard - looking to clear the man at long-off, get the height but not the distance, Rao at deep long-off times his jump to perfection and takes a fantastic overhead catch - Hafeez strikes
driven back to the bowler
again Kemp is made to play straight - well bowled Hafeez
down the leg side but Kemp fails to make contact
driven down to long-on for an easy single
played wide of mid-on and they scamper through for a single
wicket to wicket delivery and Nel obediently plays it back to the bowler
this is smart bowling from Razzaq - he drags it short and a surprised Nel can only watch the ball settle into the keeper's gloves
off the pads to the midwicket region, easy single brings Kemp to the fore
driven down to long-off, gets it wide of the fielder in the deep and they scamper back for the second
glided down to third man, Kemp takes on the fielder in the deep and makes it back for the second - excellent running but he is off stike now
driven down to long-on, Kemp is back on strike - this is going to be fun
steps out and drives it down to long-on
swept away to deep midwicket
there it is! tossed up and turning in, Kemp has a mighty slog and gets it on the middle and the ball sails over the midwicket fence - mighty hit
again goes for it but this time ends up with an inside edge to midwicket
full and in the block-hole, Kemp had no option but to defend it - well bowled Hafeez
inside edge onto the pads and the ball rolls away on the off side, quick single
and Gul strikes straightaway! Kemp goes for the big one but on this occasion he only manages to find the fielder at long-on. End of a fighting knock from the big man - South Africa eight down
horrible delivery down the leg side and the ball runs down to the fine leg fence - that's a gift and a half
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Nel has a swing at it, ball clips the inside edge and races away to the fine leg fence, valiant effort in the deep from Rao ends in vain
swung away to deep midwicket, two more added to the total
short ball and Nel fails to make contact
and Nel finishes it in style - good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Nel makes room, gets well inside the line and drills it through extra cover for a marvellous boundary

inn2.comm: on target straightaway, defended watchfully
good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing, Hafeez gets forward and forces it away through cover point, Pakistan are away
bit wide outside the off stump, Farhat leaves it through to the keeper
glided down to third man and Farhat is off the mark with an easy single
watchfully played
Pollock strays down the leg side and Hafeez works it down to fine leg for a brace
short rising delivery on the rips, Farhat fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the thigh pad

short of a good length delivery, all Ntini had to do was hit the right line and length, ball moved away sharply, Hafeez had no option but to play at it and the edge went straight to Smith at first slip - as expected Ntini strikes early
peach of a delivery, on and around the off stump line and shaping away, excellent delivery first up and Khan was clueless
driven on the up to the point fielder
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
short rising and shaping away, Khan has a half hearted prod at it and the ball zips past the outside edge - end of a successful over
fuller in length and Farhat drives it down to mid-off, Nel there dives across to his right and saves runs
good length delivery, shaping away a touch but nothing special there, Farhat watchfully leaves it through to the keeper
called for overstepping - glided down to third man for an easy single
good length delivery, this one came back in off the seam - Khan gets well forward and defends it away towards cover
this one jagged back in sharply but Younis Khan had it covered nicely - defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls away on the off side
left alone outside the off stump
fraction short and coming in with the angle, Khan goes right back and cuts hard but fails to get it past the fielder at point
turned away towards short midwicket, early call and a quick single is added to the total
short of a good length delivery, angled in from wide of the crease, Khan goes for the pull but misses the target by a mile
short of a good length delivery, this one nipped back in sharply - Khan ends up with an inside edge onto his pad
again Ntini drags it short and the ball comes in with the angle, defended towards cover
off-target, drifting down the leg side and helps the ball down to fine leg for an easy single

once again Farhat holes out in the deep playing a half-hearted cut - short and angling across, Farhat tried to pull out of the cut shot but it was too late and the ball sailed straight to Pollock at third man.
played down to third man for an easy single
defended on the front-foot
driven away towards cover, mis-field allows the batsmen to scamper through for a single
left alone outside the off stump
again Pollock oversteps
bit of extra bounce and angled in, Khan stays back and works it away towards square leg for a single
short of a good length delivery, bit wide outside the off stump - any other day Yousuf would have gone after it but not today, well played
driven away towards cover, diving stop saves runs
short and angling in, Khan stands tall on the back-foot and defends it down
again bowled from wide of the crease, gets bit of extra bounce from a good length area, Khan did well in the end
beaten outside the off stump, this one straightened a bit after hitting the deck and Khan was playing for the one that comes in with the angle - well bowled Ntini
Ntini is mixing it up nicely here - this one came in with the angle, Khan nicely got on top of the bounce and played it away towards midwicket
forced away off the back-foot to the point region. After two wickets in two overs, Ntini comes up with a maiden
left alone outside the off stump
fuller in length with a hint of swing attacked to it at the tail end, Yousuf drives away from his body and the ball zips past the inside edge of the bat
another ripper! this one probably hit the seam and jagged back in, Yousuf was all at sea
edged but short! finally Pollock gets Yousuf to nick one but the ball falls short of the fielder at second slip

finally he gets his man, that too with a beauty! good length delivery, this one hit the deck and nipped back in. Yousuf pushed forward in an effort to negate the swing but he made the cardinal mistake of leaving a big gap between bat and pad and there followed the dreadful sound of timber breaking
driven to point
good length delivery outside the off stump and Khan drills it through extra cover for a fantastic boundary

Khan finds a solution to his misery! short ball, coming in with the angle - Khan goes for the pull and ends up edging it straight up towards mid-on, Langeveldt judged it to perfection - Ntini gets one more to his name and Pakistan's slump continues
greats the new man with a short ball, defended awkwardly

another one bites the dust! short delivery down the leg side, Malik has a poke at it and the ball goes behind off the glove - Boucher had to dive full length to his left, he was at full stretch and horizontal to the ground when he took it - unbelievable stuff, easily  one of the best catches I have ever seen
way outside the off stump
beaten, another ripper from Ntini
left alone watchfully
good length delivery, Akmal ends up with an inside edge onto the pad
edged away towards third man
defended on the back-foot
smashing! half-volley outside the off stump and Razzaq smokes it through extra cover
short of a good length delivery, left alone
another jaffer outside the off stump and Razzaq is beaten all ends up
short and angling in, ball clips the thigh pad and goes straight to the fielder at short fine leg - loud appeal turned down
left alone outside the off stump
short and wide outside the off stump, Akmal leaves it through to the keeper
defended on the back-foot
beaten outside the off stump

Cometh the hour, cometh the man - Ntini on the rampage here! good length delivery, this one just jagged back off the track and Akmal is trapped stone dead - easy one for Billy. Pakistan six down - South Africa need just four more to wrap this up
defended outside the off stump
beaten outside the off stump
glided down to third man for a single
good length delivery, again the extra bounce produces a thick edge but on this occasion the ball flies away well wide of the fielder at gully
and again, Pollock gets another ball to talk and Razzaq is turned inside out, missed the edge by a whisker there
defended on the front-foot, well played
short ball, angled in from wide outside the off stump, Afridi goes for the pull and the ball goes through to the keeper, half-hearted appeal for lbw turned down
another swing and a miss - this time the ball was well outside the off stump
another short delivery, again angled in - this time he makes contact with the pull shot and the ball sails over the midwicket fence - that's Afridi for you
wayward delivery down the leg side, Afridi gets a touch on it and the ball races away to the fine leg fence - this is turning out to be a good over for Pakistan
good length delivery outside the off stump, another Afridi swing fails to make contact - was nowhere near the line of that one
clipped away off the pad to deep square leg

that's the end of that ! a skidder, pitched on middle and off and angling in, Afridi makes room and swings hard, again the bat was nowhere near the line of the ball but this time the result is fatal - ball hits the pad in-line with the leg stump and the loud appeal is upheld by umpire Benson
played down to fine leg
left alone outside the off stump
defended to point, watchfully played - Razzaq at the moment is easily the odd-man-out
driven straight to the fielder at point
way down the leg side, just a gentle loosener
beaten on the drive, almost another one
again down the leg side, so a-struggling-bowler is not an extinct species
defended down watchfully
another play-and-miss outside the off stump
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region
Nel finally gets one to do a bit, jagged back in and the ball rolls away off the pad
beaten outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump and Razzaq leaves it through to the keeper

now what can i say! good length delivery, seamed in sharply and Razzaq was beaten by the movement, plays an awkward looking defensive shot, ball clips the inside edge, kisses the pad and crashes into the stumps - Langeveldt picks up a wicket in his first over and South Africa are just two wickets away from the semis
short ball outside off stump, swinging away, Gul goes after it and gets beaten
length ball way outside off stump, Gul doesnt mind and goes after it again
short and wide outside off stump, batsman slashes and misses it
short and quick on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to point
full length ball outside off stump, Yasir slashes hard at it and ball flies off the edge to thirdman
short of length ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to offside
swinging down the leg side, no chance for Boucher to collect and ball runs away to the fence
short ball on the off stump, swinging away, batsman comprehensively beaten
good sharp bouncer directed well, batsman ducks underneath in time
short of length ball on the off stump, pushed away off the back-foot into covers

good length ball on the off stump, Gul moves forward and drives uppishly back to the bowler, Langeveldt stretches his right hand and gets onto the ball but couldnt latch onto it, a hard chance put down
driven on the up to mid-off fielder
short of length ball on the off stump, beaten on the back-foot
left alone outside off stump
full length ball outside off stump, batsman goes after it and gets beaten again
fraction short outside off stump, Gul goes for an ambitious pull shot, beaten again
short of length ball around the off stump, moving away, batsman beaten again
defended on the back-foot to offside
short ball outside off stump, batsman moves back and slashes, misses it again
short of length ball on the middle stump, nipping in, defended to onside
short ball swinging away outside off stump, Yasir this time gets it right, cuts it nicely past the point fielder
beaten again, short of length ball and swinging away
yorker on the off stump, Gul brings his bat down in time and defends it
Gul just stands and swings at it, gets beaten by the away movement
fraction short and nipping in, defended away to onside
short ball and given width this time, Gul cuts it away but Gibbs brings off a nice stop at gully
short ball banged in on the off stump, Gul goes for the hook and ends u getting hit on the shoulder, ball balloons to slip cordon but Benson declines the appeal
good length ball outside off stump, swinging away, beaten on the front-foot
beaten again by the away movement
one more beaten, Yasir has no clue to the swing bowling
four on the trot now - superb bowling from Nel but not finding the edge
this time Yasir doesnt hang his bat and instead lets it go
full length ball outside off stump, edged away to thirdman
full length ball on the off stump, Yasir drives on the front-foot to long-off fence
good length ball on the off stump, swinging away, batsman pushes hard at it and gets the outside edge, ball flies past the diving gully fielder to thirdman fence
edged away again but this time straight to thirdman fielder
short ball on the off stump, Gul pulls it away to mid-wicket for a couple of runs
good length ball outside off stump, nipping in, left alone
length ball around the off stump, Yasir beaten on the front-foot
left alone outside off stump
short ball banged in outside off stump, Yasir slashes but misses it
short of length ball outside off stump, cut away to thirdman
off the pads to fine leg
defended on the back-foot to offside
short of length ball around the off stump, swinging away, batsman beaten again
Nine down! short ball on the off stump, Gul goes for an ambitious pull shot and ends up getting a top edge, ball goes high in the air, Boucher gets underneath and takes the skier
length ball on the off stump, Yasir has a wild swing at it and gets beaten
short ball banged in, Yasir tries to duck but was too late to get his bat down, ball takes off the edge and flies over Boucher
beaten around the off stump
full length ball on the off stump, Rao pushes into covers and takes an easy single
short of length ball on the middle stump, nipping in, batsman turns it away to mid-wicket
on the pads, batsman flicks and gets an inside edge onto the pads, Boucher dives to his left and attempts but does not latch onto it
good length ball outside off stump, swinging away, Yasir lofts it away over the point fielder
bouncer on the stumps, batsman ducks underneath
good length ball on the middle and leg stump, defended on the front-foot to mid-on
good length ball around the off stump, swinging away, Rao drives and gets the outside edge, low chance put down by de Villiers at 4th slip
short of length ball around the off stump, batsman pushes and gets beaten this time
short ball on the middle stump, batsman comes in line and defends to onside, easy single taken
Yasir pushes on the back-foot to gully fielder

All over! short ball banged in outside off stump, Yasir falls back and slashes hard, ends up hitting high in the air towards thirdman, Ntini runs across and takes an easy catch. South Africa win by 124 runs
